sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/displayweather.css"; function DisplayWeather(props) { // console.log(props) const data = props.data; console.log(data); const iconUrl = "https://openweathermap.org/img/wn/" + `${data.cod !== '404' ? data.weather[0].icon : null}` + ".png"; return (
{data.cod !== '404' ? (
{data.name} {data.sys.country}. Weather As of {new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}

{Math.floor(data.main.temp - 273.15)} o

{data.weather[0].main} {data.weather[0].description}

High/Low

 {Math.floor(data.main.temp_max - 273.15)} /{" "} {Math.floor(data.main.temp_min - 273.15)} o C

Humidity

 {data.main.humidity} %

Pressure

 {data.main.pressure} hPa

Visibility

 {data.visibility / 1000} km

Wind

 {Math.floor((data.wind.speed * 18) / 5)} km/hr

Wind Direction

 {data.wind.deg} o deg

Sunrise

 {new Date(data.sys.sunrise * 1000).toLocaleTimeString( "en-US", { hour: "numeric", hour12: true } )}{" "}

Sunset

 {new Date(data.sys.sunset * 1000).toLocaleTimeString( "en-US", { hour: "numeric", hour12: true } )}
) : (

{data.message}

)}
); } export default DisplayWeather;
